website_summaries.verdict: Survivalists as well as other outdoor enthusiasts will be interested in this affordable, chemical-free, multi-stage water purifier straw.
pros: This portable device filters out 99.99% of waterborne bacteria and parasites by using a compact multi-stage filtration system
The process includes an activated carbon fiber layer, which can help remove some of the chemical pollutants while improving the taste of your water
cons: While this unit is touted as being extremely compact, some users were surprised to discover how small it actually is: 7.5 inches

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works just as well as LifeStraw!
customer_reviews.text: This straw was a fantastic addition to our survival/hiking packs. I love that it's JUST AS reliable as the more famous brand- but at a much lower price point. I feel so much better hiking New Hampshire knowing I have this in my bag as it's one of the most important things for your survival kit.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Echevarria

customer_reviews.title: A hiking necessity
customer_reviews.text: I used this filter in a stream in Shenandoah National Park, along the A.T. Worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: but this works great in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a recent trip near the AT. Worked wonders. I prefer using an actual high volume filter, but this works great in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Fate32

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind when hiking/fishing
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually used it yet because I havent been in an emergency where this would help. (Always pack water, duh) but I keep it in my backpack for peace of mind. Doesn't take up much room at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: What the advertisement doesn't tell you is that this is made in China. Not happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Small enough to fit anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to put in a bug-out pack, nice and compact, still in package so I can't comment on how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: have not tried them yet but look like the Aqua filter except the color and much less expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it looks like it'll do a great job
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, like the fact it comes with a neck lanyard.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: but is arrived just as described and I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this personal filter, but is arrived just as described and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bus-Lady

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully we never have to open to use them but they are a great thing to have
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my family to go in our emergency bags. We watched countless videos and read many reviews. Hopefully we never have to open to use them but they are a great thing to have. Never know what emergency can happen and you will be without access to clean drinking water.
customer_reviews.author: div

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hope this works one day.. I dont plan on trying it out until I am dying
customer_reviews.author: kevlar

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time with no damage to the packaging. Since I am reserving use of this item to an emergency situation, I cannot attest to its functionality. However, since there are clear instructions on the plastic bag it came in, I do not expect any issues. No visible defects and a compact size are positive attributes to this item and I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It is for emergency use, I have yet to have an emergency. I guess I should have purchased two. One to test. It gets expensive.
customer_reviews.author: robert rogan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice to put in backpack, but a bit smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: David A Paige

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a Life Straw
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried this out yet because I simply haven't had the need to. Hoping to test it soon. I'm sure it'll do the job.
customer_reviews.author: E.Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Very good price. I keep one with the first aid ...
customer_reviews.text: On time delivery. Very good price. I keep one with the first aid kit in each of family member's car. I haven't tried it on a local stream or pond, but keep for emergency use only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: Came very fast and in perfect condition. Great for me because I'm a hiker and zombie aficionado.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I fortunately cannot attest to its quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time & as expected. Since I purchased this for emergency preparedness, I fortunately cannot attest to its quality.
customer_reviews.author: G&M K

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived promptly; great quality, exactly as expected. I keep it with me as an emergency precaution — one in the car and one in an emergency kit. I may be paranoid but it’s great to know it’s there if I need it! Would recommend to anyone looking for a good backup water filter. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Emma!

customer_reviews.title: Great to have on hand.
customer_reviews.text: I think everyone should have these on hand. With the unexpected weather changes we have seen, you can't be too careful I hope I never have to use this. However, living in FL you can't be too safe. The weather report this week is telling us to get supplies. I am happy that I have this water filter already. One less worry.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Mallard

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used this but gave it to my son to ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this but gave it to my son to add to his pack while hiking. It's lightweight and fits in his backpack. Hope he doesn't need it, but its there if he gets lost or something.
customer_reviews.author: jjtjl

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an addition to our emergency kit. Price was spot on and it came super fast- had I needed it in an emergency I could’ve ordered it and had it in time haha Definitely a good buy for the money and a must have in everyone’s emergency kits, survival kits, and camping gear
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: ... used this item camping this summer & it worked great. The water from it tastes clean & clear
customer_reviews.text: I used this item camping this summer & it worked great. The water from it tastes clean & clear. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice for camping
customer_reviews.text: Works great. So far so good. Got it for a present and they love it
customer_reviews.author: BlakeB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good, needed it for a trip to India. Works great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

product_meta.title: OxGord Aqua Marine Personal Water Filter Purifier Straw for Survival Kit and Emergency Gear - 1-Pack, 2-Pack or 3-Pack
product_meta.description: Our ultralight survival water purifier weighs in at just under 3 ounces and measures only 7.5" long making it perfect for everyday carry or a bug-out bag for emergencies. The chemical free filter uses a multi-stage filtration process making your drinking water safe and healthy by removing 99.9999% of waterborne bacteria and parasites including: E. Coli, Staphylococcus Aureus, Salmonella Typhi, Cholera, Legionella, and more. The first stage is the Pre-Filter System which removes larger objects like sediment, bugs, dust, algae, and other suspended pollutants in the water, reducing the turbidity value of the water, instantly making it more clean. Next is the MIR High Iodine Bactericidal Resin Filter Layer which thoroughly kills pathogenic bacteria (E. Coli, Staphylococcus, Salmonella, Cholera, etc.) with a sterilization rate of more than 99.9999%. Then comes the Coconut Husk Granule Active Carbon Layer. This layer removes poisonous substances from the water and improves the smell. Finally, the Activated Carbon Fiber Layer helps absorb chemical pollutants in water, improving the water taste and further reducing the turbidity value of water. (Turbidity is the cloudiness of a fluid caused by large numbers of individual particles in the water). Within each of these 4 layers are multiple levels of filtration, bringing the total number of filtration levels to 10 for superior water purification in outdoor or survival settings .Our Aqau-Marine Personal Straw Water Purifier is perfect for camping, hiking, and to keep in your bug-out bag for emergency situations.
feature_bullets: AVAILABLE COUNTS: Our Water Filter available in convenient pack counts of 1-Pack, 2-Pack or 3-Pack

GREAT FOR SURVIVAL AND EMERGENCY KITS: OxGord a trusted brand name now has something to add to your survival kit, emergency gear or just to have when camping, hiking or doing any outdoor activity or sport. Our Aqua Marine Personal Water Purifier Straw is a great accessory to add to your bug out bag or survival kit.
CHEMICAL FREE: The chemical free filter uses a multi-stage filtration process making your drinking water safe and healthy by removing 99.9999% of waterborne bacteria and parasites.
ACTIVATED CARBON FILTER: The Activated Carbon Fiber Layer helps absorb chemical pollutants in water, improving the water taste and further reducing the turbidity value of water.
FILTER AMOUNT: Filters up to 1000 liters of contaminated water without iodine, chlorine or any other harsh chemicals.
